q_ch: 2024年4月30日前完成的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What cutting tasks will be completed before April 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Expert Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Expert Cutters"

steps.sql: ['SELECT * FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 4 AND end_time < '2024-04-30';']
steps.description: Find the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Expert Cutters" that are planned to be completed before April 30, 2024
